title: Hacker Wars FAQ
aboutText1: The HackerWars Puzzle was created to help players of the Hacker Wars game find quick and reliable answers to the puzzles and challenges of the game.
aboutText2: Our goal is to organize the answers in a practical and easy-to-access way, with a simple and effective design.
whoWeAreText: This site was developed by Jalisonsousa, as part of an educational open-source project, aimed at helping players worldwide.
whyThisSiteText: The idea came to help players navigate the Hacker Wars challenges without wasting time searching for solutions in forums or other sites. Here, you find answers quickly and efficiently.
contactText: For questions or suggestions, send me a message
privacyPolicyText1: This privacy policy describes how we collect and use your information.
privacyPolicyText3: When you use our site, we collect technical information, such as browsing data and cookies, to improve your experience.
cookiesText: This site may use cookies to provide personalized ads. You can disable cookies in your browser if you wish.
